prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: James Branch Cabell Letter to Ted Robinson, 1946, Accession # 10310-c, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was purchased by the library on June 1, 1980.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: In this typed signed letter from James Branch Cabell to Ted Robinson, August 30, 1946, Cabell writes concerning his book There Were Two Piratesand adds that he hoped it was not Robinson who compared its style to that of The Rivet in Grandfather's Neck. He also comments that he enjoyed Gasparilla.
